RDNTLG.​Command.​ConsoleCommandSystem
public static
RDNTLG.​Command.​ConsoleCommandSystem

Utility made to listen for incoming commands via either the terminal or editor to execute specific methods within the assembly using the ConsoleCommandAttribute.

The expected method's signature is explained in the ConsoleCommandAttribute's documentation.

Authoring tools are available under the Tools > RDNTLG > Console Command tab in the editor.

Only available under the RDNTLG_CCM/UNITY_EDITOR preprocessor definitions.

Delegates
CommandMethod
public delegate void CommandMethod(
ArgumentsParser 
_args
)

Encapsulate a valid method using the ConsoleCommandAttribute.

Variables
commands
private static readonly Dictionary<ConsoleCommandAttribute, CommandMethod> commands

Dictionary{TKey,TValue} of CommandMethods using the ConsoleCommandAttribute.

systemThread
private static Thread systemThread

The Thread used to listen for incoming inputs from a terminal with Console.ReadLine.

ListenInput.

mainThreadQueue
private static Queue<Action> mainThreadQueue

Queue{T} of Actions to be executed onto the Main Thread.

Functions
Initialize
[RuntimeInitializeOnLoadMethod(RuntimeInitializeLoadType.SubsystemRegistration)]
private static void Initialize()

Initialize the ConsoleCommandSystem.

Launch time: RuntimeInitializeLoadType.SubsystemRegistration.

Terminate
private static void Terminate()

Terminate the ConsoleCommandSystem.

ListenInput
private static void ListenInput()

Listen for incoming inputs with Console.ReadLine.

DO NOT ATTEMPT to run that on the main thread!

FrameUpdate
private static void FrameUpdate()

Called each frame from the main thread to dequeue Actions from mainThreadQueue.

public static void Execute(
string 
_command
)

Try to execute a command.

private static void HandleDumpDebugCommand(
ArgumentsParser 
_args
)

Print all ConsoleCommandAttribute registered and available to use.
